github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Follow the conventional commit message format. Use emojis to indicate the type of change, such as '🎨' for any changes or additions to CSS files, '✨' for new features, for bug fixes '🪳', '📝'  for documentation updates. Use multiple emojis for changes to different things. Ensure the message is concise and descriptive and always includes a list of key changes.
